item.title: CV
item.description: Abstract With 10+ years of experience working in the industry, I did a full circle iteration: After starting out in software development & architecture, I was responsible (and accountable) for operating distributed systems at scale and recently focussed more on topics around resilience, managing risks and software quality in general. As I’ve come across some different technologies, I would describe my main strength as knowing a little bit about a lot of different topics.
